title: Majo Taisen
description: Jeanne d'Arc, the miraculous heroine who saved France. She was about to get her life ended, condemned to death by fire, when she was transported to another world by the power of a demon that appeared to her at the moment of her death. What she found there was a group of 32 greedy women known as "witches. With Jeanne d'Arc, being the last "Witch," in line, the opening of the battle of the Battle of a thousand and one nights, a killing contest in which only the greed of one survivor can be fulfilled, is announced...!
author: Kawamoto Homura
